description:
After solving a problem, automatically generate 2-3 related follow-up questions of varying difficulty to deepen understanding. Uses the solve history and knowledge base to identify conceptual gaps and suggest progressive practice.

**Rationale:** Students often don't know what to ask next. This feature creates a natural learning progression, keeping users engaged and helping them build mastery through strategically sequenced practice.
title: Smart Question Follow-up Suggestion Engine
